howToCrop.title: How to Crop an Image into various shapes?
howToCrop.description: Create your perfect circular or starred or heart shaped image in just a few simple steps.

steps.title: Upload Your Image
steps.description: Click the upload button and select the image you want to crop from your device.

steps.title: Select desired shape
steps.description: You can choose the desired shape to crop like heart, circle, square, star, and so on.

steps.title: Adjust the Crop
steps.description: Use the shaped crop tool to select the area you want to keep. Drag to reposition, and use the slider to resize.

steps.title: Download Image
steps.description: Click the download button to save your perfectly cropped shaped image.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.description: Create your perfect circular or starred or heart shaped image in just few simple steps.

qna.question: What image formats are supported?
qna.answer: Our HeartCrop supports all major image formats for upload, including JPG, PNG, WebP, and more. You can download your cropped image in four formats: PNG (with transparency), JPEG (best for photos), WebP (modern format with good compression), and SVG (vector format, perfect for logos and icons).

qna.question: Which shapes are availabe here in HeartCrop?
qna.answer: Our HeartCrop provides you various shapes, where there are 4 types of heart shapes, like regular heart, broken heart, etc. And we also provide shapes like square, circle, star and polygon which you can select on the left of the tool section.

qna.question: Is there a size limit for uploaded images?
qna.answer: While there's no strict size limit, we recommend uploading images under 10MB for optimal performance. The tool maintains high quality while optimizing the output file size.

qna.question: Can I use this for social media profile pictures?
qna.answer: Absolutely! Our circular crop feature is perfect for profile pictures on social media platforms like Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook. The shapes we provide are also great for thumbnails and posts.

qna.question: How do i get a transparent background?
qna.answer: When you crop an image using our tool, the output is automatically saved as a PNG with a transparent background outside the cropped area. This is perfect for logos and profile pictures.
